name: With Careful Tread (demo)
description:
Something lurks in the deep, dark woods. You are here to fix it.

A short (visual) horror story/folk tale for one player, written in Python with the Ren'Py library.

All illustrations by yours truly.

The final version of this game will include: Substantially fewer bugs, three additional endings, and additional CGs, art that's actually been formatted properly,  and (~stretch goal~) a gallery function with unlockable ending CGs.

4/14/2020: 2/??? goals accomplished!

-----

This game was a dual fill for the Hunter Horror jam and NaNoRenMo2020

Updates on other games pending. 

I am a well-known computer murderer and have nearly done in my laptop, which means every click lags and trying to finish anything in MS Word or RPGMaker is hell. But! The chicken module got beta-tested by my regular tabletop group, and it seems to work well, so that's nice.
